thread.title: Chloe - Saffron Walden
thread.title_full: tyresonthedrive.com reviewed by Chloe - Saffron Walden

author: Chloe - Saffron Walden
title: Chloe - Saffron Walden
text:
I would not have thought of using the company (had not heard of them) had it not been recommended by the RAC guy who changed my wheel with flat tyre for the spare.
What a great idea to save one's time by coming to the customer. Price similar to the garage and saved the time and hassle of having to get the car to the garage. He turned up a little earlier than slot after checking that OK. Efficient and pleasant service. Also checked and pumped up the tyres all round and reminded me to reset the computer so that no warning about tyre pressures.
